title: Fireside with the Underboss - "He Was A Rapist, A Child Molester, An Informant. He Got Killed For It."
description: Sammy shares his perspective on Whitey Bulger. Even thought they two never actually came face to face, Sammy shares what he knew about him just from being in the life.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy shares his perspective on Whitey Bulger. Even thought they two never actually came face to face, Sammy shares what he knew about him just from being in the life.
